definition: to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: But another is the fact that Paul fears for the lost.
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面則是保羅爲失落的人而感到懼怕。

sentences.english: And through the dream the future wept, grieving for the lost tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 夢中的未來悲慟哀泣，追悼失落的明天。

sentences.english: When you want something and cannot get it you become frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 當你想要一些東西卻無法得手時，你變得失落。

sentences.english: Only by sticking to the socialist road can we do away with the root cause of poverty. (p. 330)
sentences.chinese: 只有堅定走社會主義門路才華挖失落窮根。

sentences.english: Sometimes a person's loss, aloof and a world.
sentences.chinese: 有時候一個人的失落，孤傲了一個世界。

sentences.english: The way she spends money is as if money grows on trees.
sentences.chinese: 她花錢的體例就像錢是從樹上失落下來的。

sentences.english: The recovery of the lost wallet thrilled the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 失落錢包的復得使全家人興奮不已。

sentences.english: "Ever sit with desolate, the evil superfluous in this student" is its portrayal in the sense of loss.
sentences.chinese: “含悽坐永日，所惡贅此生”是其處於失落的寫照。

sentences.english: What chutian change Korea thin film very frustrated, even fainted in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 何楚天的改變讓韓疏影萬分失落，甚至暈倒在雨中。

sentences.english: The recovery of the lost wallet thrilled the whole home.
sentences.chinese: 失落錢包的復得使全家人興奮不已。

sentences.english: After the dazzling fireworks flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum, after the passion of vanity.
sentences.chinese: 煙火璀璨過後的曇花一現，激情過後的空虛失落。

sentences.english: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass, than one tittle of the law to fall.
sentences.chinese: 然而天地過去，比法律的一筆一畫失落，還要容易。

sentences.english: Make you enjoy a long-lost "kingdom of Sunbird deity".
sentences.chinese: 讓您走進一個失落已久的“太陽神鳥王國”。

sentences.chinese: 廖思成抉擇殺失落陳連石，替姚立星報仇。

sentences.english: In everyone look around talk smile, but I always feel arrive lose just some little.
sentences.chinese: 在大家的顧盼談笑中，我卻總感覺到些許的失落。

sentences.english: He is full of valour and vigour , but he also has  depression.
sentences.chinese: 他勇猛而有活力，但他同樣也有失落的時候。

definition: to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to feel guilty/to feel ashamed of oneself/to be remorseful
guilty conscience/to feel a twinge of guilt
